field.name: ADCCLK
field.desc: ADC Clock Divisor, output is FS*256

field.name: DACCLK
field.desc: DAC Clock Divisor, output is FS*256

field.name: BCKCON
field.desc: Divided PWM Back Light Special Clock Control

field.name: OUTE
field.desc: FM Clock Output Enable (From Test Pin)

field.name: SDR
field.desc: SDRAM Control register and SDRAM block Reset

node.name: DMAC
node.title: Direct Memory Access Controller
node.desc: Channels 0-3 work with retular AHB bus, channels 4-7 work with 'special' bus.

field.name: DBURLEN
field.desc: Destination burst length. If burst lenght is 4 or 8 DDIR must be 0, DFXA must be 0, DDSP must be 0, DCOL must be 0. Burst must not cross a 1kB address boundary.

field.name: DDIR
field.desc: Destination address direction. If DBURLEN is INCR4 or INCR8 only INCREASE is allowed.

field.name: DFXS
field.desc: If DFXS=0, DMA will transfer in 8bit mode when remain counter is less than DTRANWID. If DFXS=1, DMA will always transfer in DTRANWID.

field.name: SBURLEN
field.desc: Source burst length. If burst lenght is 4 or 8 DDIR must be 0, DFXA must be 0, DDSP must be 0, DCOL must be 0. Burst must not cross a 1kB address boundary.

field.name: SDIR
field.desc: Source address direction. If SBURLEN is INCR4 or INCR8 only INCREASE is allowed.

field.name: SFXS
field.desc: Source Fix Size. If DFXS=0, DMA will transfer in 8bit mode when remain counter is less than STRANWID. If SFXS=1, DMA will always transfer in STRANWID.

field.name: SIE
field.desc: START Condition Generates IRQ Enable (only for slave mode)

field.name: GBCC
field.desc: Generating Bus Control Condition (only for master mode)

field.name: RB
field.desc: Release Bus. Writing 1 to this bit will release the clock and data line to idle. MCU should write 1 to this bit after transmitting or receiving the last bit of the whole transfer.

field.name: CLKDIV
field.desc: Clock Divider Factor (only for master mode). I2Cx clock (SCL) can select standard (100kbps) mode and fast (400kbps) mode. Calculating SCL is as follows: SCL=PCLK/(CLKDIV*16)

field.name: RWST
field.desc: Read/Write Status Bit (only for Slave mode)

node.name: PCNT
node.title: Performance Counters
node.desc: The base address is not clear!

node.name: RTCWDT
node.title: Real Time Clock, Timers and Watchdog

field.name: HS
field.desc: Enter high speed operation. Set by core on connection.

field.name: SETUP_DATA
field.desc: Setup data are ready to be accessed in SETUPDAT buffer.

register.desc: Interrupt vector register known (guessed) values: 0x00 - SETUP 0x10 - RESET 0x14 - HS 0x28 - EPs 0xD8 - OTG
High speed max packed size LSB

field.name: ERP
field.desc: FIFO Error Pending Bit. Write 1 to the bit to clear it and reset the FIFO.
